title: PHPhrtime()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPhrtime()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the system's high resolution time:
<html>
<body>
<?php
echo hrtime();
?>
</body>
</html>
The output of the code above could be something like this:
233568471904329635
Definition and Usage
The hrtime() function returns the system's high resolution time.
Syntax
hrtime(
return_as_num
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
return_as_num
Optional. If set to TRUE, this function will return the high resolution 
    time as array or number. Default is FALSE
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns nanoseconds or an array of integers
PHP Version:
7.3+

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPhrtime()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPhrtime()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples.
